import React,{useState}from'react';import{homeWorkReducer}from'./bll/homeWorkReducer';import s from'./HW8.module.css';import s2 from'../../junior.module.css';import SuperButton from'../hw04/common/c2-SuperButton/SuperButton';import User from'./User';/*

* 3 - сделать стили в соответствии с дизайном
* */import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const initialPeople=[// студенты могут поменять имя/возраст/количество объектов, _id должны быть целочисленные
{_id:0,name:'Кот',age:3},{_id:1,name:'Александр',age:66},{_id:2,name:'Коля',age:16},{_id:3,name:'Виктор',age:44},{_id:4,name:'Дмитрий',age:40},{_id:5,name:'Ирина',age:55}];const HW8=()=>{const[people,setPeople]=useState(initialPeople);const[currentSort,setCurrentSort]=useState('');const finalPeople=people.map(u=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(User,{u:u},u._id));const sortUp=()=>{setPeople(homeWorkReducer(initialPeople,{type:'sort',payload:'up'}));// в алфавитном порядке a.name > b.name
setCurrentSort('up');};const sortDown=()=>{setPeople(homeWorkReducer(initialPeople,{type:'sort',payload:'down'}));// в обратном порядке a.name < b.name}
people.reverse();setCurrentSort('down');};const check18=()=>{setPeople(homeWorkReducer(initialPeople,{type:'check',payload:18}));// совершеннолетние
setCurrentSort('18');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:'hw3',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:s2.hwTitle,children:"Homework #8"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:s2.hw,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:s.container,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:s.buttonsContainer,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SuperButton,{id:'hw8-button-up',onClick:sortUp,xType:currentSort==='up'?'':'secondary',children:"Sort up"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SuperButton,{id:'hw8-button-down',onClick:sortDown,xType:currentSort==='down'?'':'secondary',children:"Sort down"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SuperButton,{id:'hw8-button-18',onClick:check18,xType:currentSort==='18'?'':'secondary',children:"Check 18+"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{id:'hw8-users',className:s.users,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{className:s.thead,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:s.nameCol,children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:s.ageCol,children:"Age"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:finalPeople})]})]})})]});};export default HW8;
